Author: Flint#6435
Content: the price has fallen as people look at bitcoin and ethereum and ask the question: why dont some altcoins fall so fast and the project with super technology is falling? it turns out that there are far fewer true holders - holders do not sell what they believe in price fluctuations - they make investments for several years - but as the chart showed, there are very few of us! the price is rolling down and most importantly there are no trading volumes! the coin is not interesting to anyone now, in spite of its uniqueness, ordinary people dont even see in it what they see in ethereum which is confident!

Author: Flint#6435
Content: and its not a matter of binance at all, as they try to explain here - the thing is simply that people dont see the point of losing money and it is better to wait out the dump in Bitcoin - and the true long-term unit holders as it turned out - this dump showed a lot - these extremely small trading volumes say more than any "experts"! Therefore, you need to do marketing! Tron has already shown that marketing works wonders - although the project itself is worse than Komodo in every way! The project may be ‚Äúthe most advanced‚Äù any number of times, but without good marketing, very few people who simply don‚Äôt notice altcoins in this ocean will know about it.

Author: tagco#7905
Content: Hello everyone, I chose KMD instead of TEZOS because I got a deep understanding of the white paper and spent two weeks understanding the information on the website and the team. After a year, what I want to say is that in the secondary market, more than 90% of investors do not have long-term plans. They only pay attention to short-term prices, and an important insight is that if short-term currency prices continue to rise,  They become HOLDERs. Please note that this is still not the understanding of the product, but the belief that pure market volatility brings. Therefore, I really hope that the project side will consider more investors in the secondary market than purely technical ones.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
there is specific category of marketing needed for KMD.
Dev specific marketing.
if someone noticed the documentations and developer portals has been raised to the level of perfection than an year or 2 ago.
I always really been expecting such thing from such a solid tech project, but that lacked a combination of some specific skilled people who both understands playing with words and the technical understanding of the subject matter.
We got a team of people in that section really doing hard work in this area. Give big thanks to these guys we have such a solid dev docs.

There is also some advanced tutorials to see in dev documentations, they are really worth checking. if someone learns one can make their own Antara Modules using their own blockchain using Antara Framework stack.
